WorkItem.Description:
I use to "Html Agility Pack 1.4.0" and "Experimental Xpath Updates" to parse data of a web page: "http://data.vietstock.vn/TradingResult/Hose_StockIndicator.aspx?TransactionISN=2509". My xPath is "//body[1]/div[1]/table[1]/tr[3]/td[1]/table[1]". The former can parse OK. The later return null result. It seem that it does not parse the html structure right. Please check.
Thank you
WorkItem.Summary: Parsing html problem with "Experimental Xpath Updates"
